thread.title: Jiu-Jitsu academy teaches you how to defend Donald Trump’s aggressive handshake technique | For The Win
thread.title_full: Jiu-Jitsu academy teaches you how to defend Donald Trump’s aggressive handshake technique | For The Win

author: Steven Ruiz
title: Jiu-Jitsu academy teaches you how to defend Donald Trump’s aggressive handshake technique | For The Win
text:
By: Steven Ruiz | February 16, 2017 5:23 pm Follow @theStevenRuiz 
Let’s say you’re shaking the hand of a certain U.S. President, and he gets a little aggressive with you, pulling your hand toward him in some weird show of power. What do you do in that situation? 
Now we know, thanks to the good folks at Relson Gracie Jiu-Jitsu Academy in Columbus, Ohio. One thing: I’d actually advise you not to put the president in a wrist lock. Just throwing that out there. More MMA!
